item.title: Tencent introduces ‘Hunyuan3D 2.0’ AI that speeds up 3D design from days to seconds
item.description: Tencent's Hunyuan3D 2.0 transforms simple images into detailed 3D models in seconds, a breakthrough in AI technology that could reshape how industries...

item.title: How Axis Security is using Xpander.AI’s agent platform to supercharge customer support ticket management
item.description: Through its partnership with xpander, Axis says it has managed to save thousands of hours monthly and grow its team sustainably.

item.title: GDC survey reveals a rocky year of layoffs and AI skepticism for game developers
item.description: The 2025 GDC survey revealed the impact of industry-wide layoffs in 2024 where one of every 11 game developers lost a job.

item.title: These are the best-paid programming languages for 2025
item.description: The software developers market is hot. Find out which software languages will earn you the most money this year.
